rows.label: qev035603_MSG0002
rows.name: Earth-alien merchant will pay for this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035603_MSG0003
rows.name:
It did boost my strength as promised.
But soon I lost control of my body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035603_MSG0004
rows.name:
Do not worry. The voice I heard through it is silenced.
I will not harm you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035603_SEL0021
rows.name: Doubt Slovity's words and stay ready for combat.

rows.label: qev035603_MSG0005
rows.name: Trusting as ever. Did it not occur to doubt me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035603_MSG0006
rows.name:
Heh heh. Perhaps that open nature is why we
surrendered to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035603_MSG0007
rows.name:
You are fine warrior. Ever sharp. Ever ready.
But you can trust me. I swear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035603_MSG0008
rows.name:
And I, in turn, trust you. If I lose control again,
you must kill me without hesitation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035603_MSG0009
rows.name:
Now I must bring this Prone to New LA.
Treat his wounds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035603_MSG0010
rows.name:
Never before have I touched Tree Clan scum.
But fault in this is clearly mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035603_MSG0012
rows.name:
I will thank you in town.
Speak to me again there.[ST:wait ]
